our_candidate.name: Lisa Kowalski
our_candidate.background: U.S. Representative from Flint area, daughter of GM autoworker, UAW endorsement, Polish-American, community organizer background

opponent.name: Mike DeGroot
opponent.background: Former CEO, business consultant, West Michigan native, Dutch-American, wealthy self-funder, outsider positioning

demographics.economic_profile: Auto industry renaissance with EV investment, manufacturing recovery, housing costs rising in suburbs, Flint still recovering from water crisis

notes: Open seat win in presidential year. Kowalski's UAW endorsement and autoworker background provided credibility on economic issues. DeGroot's CEO background became liability with working-class voters. Abortion remained salient issue in Michigan post-Prop 3. Detroit suburbs delivered margin while Flint/Saginaw turnout provided base. West Michigan more competitive than expected.
